news.title: Testimony director Aofie Kelleher: "There is still so much stigma and shame felt by the survivors"
news.summary: Director Aoife Kelleher on her new documentary Testimony, which explores survivors’ courage, State complicity, and why the Mother and Baby Homes story remains unfinished business. Interview: Roe McDermott

news.title: Paul Brady announces Dublin shows
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Friday, December 5 at 10am.

news.title: The Altered Hours: "Distortion to me is the sound of beautiful rebellion"
news.summary: Cathal MacGabhann of The Altered Hours talks about the band’s new self-titled LP, obscure ’60s compilations and the joys of distortion

news.title: The best new movies to see this Christmas
news.summary: Roe McDermott looks at the best movies hitting cinemas this festive season.

news.title: Dublin’s coffee culture: "Even in the face of the increasingly flashy make-it-at-home machines, the pull of the local coffee shop remains irresistible"
news.summary: From innovative roasters, to local baristas who know your order off by heart, we’re raising a cup to Dublin’s vibrant coffee culture…

news.title: Florence Road featured on BBC Radio 1 Sound Of 2026 longlist
news.summary: The shortlist is set to be announced starting on Monday, January 5, 2026, with the winner crowned on Friday, January 9.

news.title: Rob De Boer, Sean Johnston, Sara Miller and more announced for Another Love Story’s Another New Year’s Eve celebration
news.summary: The annual new year’s eve celebration will take place across December 31 and January 1 at Borris House, Co. Carlow.
